name: Chaos Control
description: Chaos Control, a super-production designed entirely on Silicon Graphics, takes you to the heart of a fantastic epic that blends cyberculture, virtual travel and manga graphics. At the controls of a space fighter, your dangerous missions will lead you into a unique spectacle with multiple, fantastic sets in full screen 3D vision.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Pentium 4a Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Athlon 64 or later Storage: 450 MB available space
